name: The Roots Family
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2023, theme "Roots".

A game about family, love, support, and inheritance.

Control:

 A/D or ←→: Move left, right

 W or Space: Jump 

Hold Shift: Zoom out and enjoy the family tree. 

You have 2 lives. Red birds will attack you and make you lose a life. But family members will heal you. Stay close to them when you are in danger. Tree branches will block the birds, too.
